channel.title: [WIP] M96 Expeditionary Rifle, updated 7/6/10 (early in the a.m) [WIP]
channel.description:
Well I decided to start my next project....An M96 Expeditionary Rifle....Here is the picture of it, and the work Ive done so far!
Please leave comments on how I can improve.
p.s. Ignore holes you see, they are there for a reason, and I havnt added some bolts and screws yet, sooo...
[size=18pt]~~~~~~~~Original Photo~~~~~~~~[/size] [URL=http://img18.imageshack.us/i/m9620rifle20new20sights.jpg/][IMG]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/5706/m9620rifle20new20sights.jpg[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt]~~~~~~~~Progressive View~~~~~~[/size] [URL=http://img18.imageshack.us/i/m96prog.png/][IMG]http://img18.imageshack.us/img18/8158/m96prog.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img412.imageshack.us/i/m96progg1.png/][IMG]http://img412.imageshack.us/img412/7127/m96progg1.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img190.imageshack.us/i/m96proggg2.png/][IMG]http://img190.imageshack.us/img190/2738/m96proggg2.png[/img][/URL]
[size=18pt]~~~~~~~~Current Pictures~~~~~~[/size] [URL=http://img269.imageshack.us/i/m96progg.png/][IMG]http://img269.imageshack.us/img269/4943/m96progg.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img411.imageshack.us/i/m96proggg.png/][IMG]http://img411.imageshack.us/img411/8890/m96proggg.png[/img][/URL] Which one is the image and which is the 3D?! Ahhhh!
[URL=http://img13.imageshack.us/i/m96proggg1.png/][IMG]http://img13.imageshack.us/img13/5719/m96proggg1.png[/img][/URL]
(I got myself some Vray :) [size=18pt]~~~~~~~~Progressive Wireframes~~~~~[/size] [URL=http://img192.imageshack.us/i/m96prog3.png/][IMG]http://img192.imageshack.us/img192/7905/m96prog3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img23.imageshack.us/i/m96progg3.png/][IMG]http://img23.imageshack.us/img23/6388/m96progg3.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img37.imageshack.us/i/m96proggg3.png/][IMG]http://img37.imageshack.us/img37/3348/m96proggg3.png[/img][/URL] ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Your comments are appreciated, and yes this is being done in Cinema4D, rendered in Vray.

item.title: [WIP] M96 Expeditionary Rifle, updated 7/6/10 (early in the a.m) [WIP]
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

kirikugi:

Do you think you could show us an ingame view of it

This is why graphics section is much better, you don’t get people asking for this, hah.

I don’t really have any criticism, it’s perfect so far, structure and all.

Only heads up would be, don’t start adding materials until after you’re done, I always do that then I just decide it looks good enough without finishing it, then it never gets finished.

Read full topic
